summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5308 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 3, Lakeside Addition, being the alley between 35th Avenue and 36th Avenue, from East Pike Street to East Pine Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 61484, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund and authorizing the issuance of bonds.
